known_issues: Reported issue: previously requested changes were not actually deployed (deployment appears out of sync with expected code/changes).

existing_features.title: Verify the Landing page header branding is the text-based SHAMMAH header (no Butterfly Wellness wordmark in the header) and ensure there are no remaining references in the frontend code to `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png` for the header branding.
Add a visible, user-facing build marker on the Landing page (e.g., in the footer) that changes on each deployment to make it obvious when the latest frontend bundle is live.
Implement cache-busting for critical static assets on the Landing page so users do not see stale UI after deployment (e.g., append the build marker as a query parameter to the hero image URL).

projectName: Ensure latest frontend changes are actually deployed and add a visible build marker
